participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, enjoys creative pursuits and family-oriented activities.
participant_1.background: I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once. I get distracted easily. I am a white person who is raising my child in an environmentally friendly way. I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies. My brother is an archaeologist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Humorous and creative, loves to engage in fun conversations and express ideas through art.
participant_2.background: After I quit my job, I returned the 2 monitors to my boss. I'm going to work on a new piece for my portfolio. I'm looking forward to a relaxing weekend at home with my dog, playing games and watching movies. Connor McGregor is my favorite fighter. I love to tell jokes.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Doing good, just got home from work. How about you?
Same here, just getting off work as well.
What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer, what about you?
I'm a graphic designer.
Oh cool, I used to do some graphic design work in my spare time.
That's awesome, what kind of work did you do?
Mostly web design and some logos.
That's cool, I'm looking forward to working on a new piece for my portfolio.
That sounds fun, what kind of piece are you working on?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about doing something with a nature theme.
Oh cool, I love nature themes.
Yeah, me too. I think it's important to be environmentally friendly.
I agree, it's a big problem we're facing right now.
Yeah, we need to do something about it.
I'm not sure what we can do, but I'm glad people are talking about it.
Me too, I think it's the first step to making a difference.
I hope so.
Me too.
